name: Ascending Air
description:
Ascending Air

Ascending Air is a skill game made for the Mini Jam 84: Bubbles. The limitation was, 'You are your own ammo'. 

Guide your bubble through 10 levels of fish, squids and rocks to safety. Use a combination of timing and fire-power to reach the end, remember, the more you shoot the smaller you'll get. Get too small and you'll POP! 

All the music for this game was taken from my music asset packs: Browse the collection here.
